entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Cap Chat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:27 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cap-Chat 6:00 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023
Temperature: -1.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa rising
Humidity: 68 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -7.0°C
Wind: WNW 47 km/h gust 58 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Local blowing snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A few flurries. High minus 10.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then snow beginning before morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow. High minus 1. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Flurries. Low minus 9. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 7. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023
